title: REDUCED AGAIN: 1909 Lancaster Red Roses Team PC w/ Stan Coveleski (HOF)
author: h2oya311

posts.post_title: REDUCED AGAIN: 1909 Lancaster Red Roses Team PC w/ Stan Coveleski (HOF)
posts.post_content:
Up for sale is the following 1909 Lancaster Red Roses Team PC featuring Stan Coveleski (bottom left), which pre-dates his 1915 Zeenut and 1920 W520/W522 "rookies" by a large margin.  The postcard was postally used/canceled on October 16, 1909.  The front is immaculate.

[S]$475[/S] [S]$425[/S] $375 - final price cut.

Shipping is on me.  PM or email me at [url]h2oya311@yahoo.com[/url].

[IMG]https://photos.imageevent.com/derekgranger/derekgrangerfirstalbum/websize/1909%20Coveleski.jpg[/IMG][IMG]https://photos.imageevent.com/derekgranger/derekgrangerfirstalbum/websize/1909%20Coveleski%20_back_.jpg[/IMG]

Bump for final price cut.  

compare to this one ($649) from 2013 and you see you've got yourself a great deal!

[url]https://loveofthegameauctions.com/LotDetail.aspx?inventoryid=1607[/url]
